ygData.subject: Re: Twisting Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Sheesh, and I thought I was an old fart at 32.  hehe As for swapping instruments mid-fight, I think I tried that maybe 2 times, and the difference it made
ygData.messageBody:
Sheesh, and I thought I was an old fart at 32. hehe

As for swapping instruments mid-fight, I think I tried that maybe 2 times,
and the difference it made wasn't worth the trouble it was to keep doing
repeatedly. Plus I'm one of those people that never quite got the hang of
using hotkeys for songs. I'm pretty much stuck on the old mouse for
twistings, which makes it a little harder to switch songs/instruments.

If I'm in a caster-heavy group, I will equip Nostrolo's Tambourine and
chant. If I'm in a melee heavy group, I'll switch to weapons and swing with
the big boys with Celerity and 2 chants.

But then maybe it helps that I'm usually in a good group and don't NEED to
add that little bit of extra damage...

Olgwinn Pendragun
Bard of 47 Missed Notes
